abstract: The write-down for the science-fiction megaflop was expected to be smaller — from $100 million to $165 million. The film’s poor performance will cause a quarterly operating loss for Walt Disney Studios of $80 million to $120 million.
snippet: The write-down for the science-fiction megaflop was expected to be smaller — from $100 million to $165 million. The film’s poor performance will cause a quarterly operating loss for Walt Disney Studios of $80 million to $120 million.
lead_paragraph: Walt Disney Studios said on Monday that it would take a write-down of about $200 million tied to the science-fiction megaflop “John Carter.”

headline.main: $200 Million Write-Down for ‘John Carter,’ Disney Says
